questions.question_text: Which of the following are examples of HR application scopes? (Choose four.)
What happens when a cross-scope attempt is executed?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct. The system does not allow execution. This must be manually changed to allowed. The answer is c is irritating and incorrect
I believe it should be A?

Selected Answer: C
"When a cross-scope application attempts to access a resource set to Caller Restriction, the system denies access to the resource and creates a record in the Restricted Caller Access table with a status of Requested."

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-application-development/page/build/applications/task/set-RCA-level.html

choices.C: The Read record status is set to requested before the system will allow the script to run
choices.A: The record is automatically added to the Restricted Caller Access Privileges table
choices.D: The record status is automatically set to allowed
choices.B: The record is automatically set to caller tracking

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCE
BCE is correct

Selected Answer: BCE
BCE is correct

Selected Answer: BDE
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-release-notes/page/release-notes/hr-service-delivery/hr-jny-designer-v2-rn.html

ourney template owners, who are enabled to manage and create journeys templates for assigned audiences, can do the following actions:
Create task templates for their audience in a simple, user-friendly experience.
Change only the task templates that they own.
Manage the order and flow of the journey stages and tasks.
Manage the journey templates from the Employee Center for the intended audience that is defined in the template.

questions.question_text: What are the functions of a journey template owner? (Choose three.)

choices.A: Restrict inter-departmental transfer of sensitive case details
choices.C: Create task templates for their audience in a simple user-friendly experience
choices.B: Manage the order and flow of the journey stages and tasks
choices.D: Message new hire to welcome them to the team
choices.E: Change only the task templates that they own

choices.C: Populate fields on the HR Profile
choices.A: Populate fields on a Journey task
choices.D: Populate fields on the HR Case record

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct
